Articles.Content:
NOW KSS Kerbal Safety Systems!

I'm proud to Present the new KSP EJECTION SEAT mod.

This will (Eventually) add a range of Seats and features making it more likely that your brave Kerbonauts will survive (Yay)

"For that rare occasion when your kerbal absolutely must survive"

Modelling/coding = C13XQRSTAFF

Texturing = amankd

Edited February 25, 2015 by C13XQRSTAFF
wooooooooooooooooooooo! jeb will LIVE!!
indeed he will!
If you want I can help with modelling (I've done a cockpit model with an ejectable hood )
You should know that this has been done already as part of other mods. That said, a standalone version would be nice.
Is this going to be actual seats or more like Vanguard Technologies?
This was actually one of my guesses for the "secret" feature that ended up being explosive buildings. Glad to see a modder taking up the cause.

You should know that this has been done already as part of other mods. That said, a standalone version would be nice.

The only mod I knew who was doing this kind of stuff (mine is like a fighter cockpit btw) was a mod made for ksp 0.16 whitch add a whole "kit" to make su-27 style planes

And it had a ejectable seat

The only mod I knew who was doing this kind of stuff (mine is like a fighter cockpit btw) was a mod made for ksp 0.16 whitch add a whole "kit" to make su-27 style planes

And it had a ejectable seat

Yeah I remember that Mod, Anyway Quick update the Seat Model is 100% complete and is partially textured (Mainly so my Texturer knows what is what and can distinguish between sections) the code is slowly slowly being written

No idea when I'll complete it obviously RL Stuff is priority ATM

Thanks

I'm proud to Present the new KSP EJECTION SEAT mod.

This will (Eventually) add a range of Seats and features making it more likely that your brave Kerbonauts will survive (Yay)

Modelling/coding = C13XQRSTAFF

Texturing = amankd

Great, now everyone is going to make fail planea just for an excuse to use the seats! XD

If you want I can help with modelling (I've done a cockpit model with an ejectable hood )

Hmmmm I might take you up on that offer, I'll get back to you

Thanks here is my e-mail if you want

[email protected]

Psst next time send it through PM.
So how progress has gone. I would like a more updated one.
Hello everyone. Progress is coming along now. Had a block of exams so work slowed. however now time is no longer an issue so I shall pour more time into the project.
Sounds interesting. Looking forward to testing this out once its been finished.
Glad to hear progress has resumed This is something I'm very interested in seeing how it turns out
Is this still being worked on?
My son and I are looking for a more effective way of saving test pilots.  any progress on this?

14 minutes ago, gmcr70 said:

My son and I are looking for a more effective way of saving test pilots.  any progress on this? 

None that I know of, but this might fit the bill:

Hmm, hasn't been updated in QUITE some time, and OP hasn't been around lately either. I'm going to go ahead and close this one up. @C13XQRSTAFF if you decided to come back to this, send a message to a moderator and we'll open this back up.
